title: Starting To Draw All The Champions

embed.description: DeviantArt is the world's largest online social community for artists and art enthusiasts, allowing people to connect through the creation and sharing of art.

body:
So far I've only finished {{champion:266}}  but going in alphabetical order I'm planning on drawing out all the champions. {{champion:103}}  is up next.

What do you guys think so far?

Thanks for all the comments and suggestions. I know I messed up the sword - I realised that half way threw the drawing then said 'aw screw it'. As for the body detail yeah I'll make sure I get right on that, same with more background detail. :3

replies.body: This is awesome! I can't wait until you get to Nami! :3 If the rest are anything like your first, this is going to be amazing!
Katey is like the nicest Rioter, i swear :D

Saying this to try and be helpful and constructive.

The head sword and wings look great, but then his body is kind of murky and you can't see any details. I think if his body had as much detailing as his face wings and sword it would look super fucking wow.
I was about to Post this same thing!

Not an artists myself (in any imagining) so take my criticism with a grain of salt. Sword looks great as does the head/face but it seems the angles/direction are a bit off and the proportions on his torso could probably be better. All that being said infinitely better than anything I can do and I hope you do more! ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Sir ArmaMalum,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=MQEeieh3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-23T20:14:57.558+0000)
>
> Not an artists myself (in any imagining) so take my criticism with a grain of salt. Sword looks great as does the head/face but it seems the angles/direction are a bit off and the proportions on his torso could probably be better. All that being said infinitely better than anything I can do and I hope you do more! ^_^

I agree with what you said about the angles. Not an artist either but I was also noticing how it seems like the main features of his body are all centered around what appear to be near 90 degree angles. His right arm for instance travels straight outward from shoulder to elbow and pulls forward into a 90 degree angle to where he grasps his sword. The arm position doesn't look nature it appears to be forced considering where the sword comes to appear at in perspective. In order to remedy this I believe his right arm should be angled slightly bawkward so that his elbow would present itself behind the plane of his back and the angle from his elbow should be far less defined that the right angle that is present. The 90 degree angle also presents itself on the left arm as it travels straight outward from shoulder to elbow and then fires at a 90 degree angle downward to his hand that is resting the ground. Again it doesn't appear to be a natural position. 

Not to be way knit picky over it because it's better than anything that I can do by any means. Hope to see more in the future.

7.8/10 "Too much blood"
-IGN


Hahaha, but seriously, well drawn.

Man you are going to get a crap ton of practice.

By the time you get to {{champion:143}} ,your skills would have increased immensely.May I ask if you can post an art collection so we can see your overall growth (and all your quality artwork of course)?

As for the Aatrox piece,an overall good piece.I like how detailed the sword & wings are.

The left hand seems like a blob of colors that is attached to the ground.As StrawberryCocoa said,the body is pretty murky.Try adding a little more details & definitions so people can tell what's what.Also I feel the light in his sword could be a little more bright so it can stand out more.
As for the environment/background,a bit more work could be pit in overall.Unless that what you were going for or something.I understand the goal is to draw the champ,but if you're drawing backgrounds at least make sure their pretty close in quality.Try adding a few details to the ground.

Sure you can, just make sure to post a link to my dA in the collection.

And thanks for the critique.

Whoops,looks like I forgot a "you".
Sorry,I meant to say can you post a collection.
Oh wow.. That's pretty good. Little odd with the angle of the arms, especially the right arm. But, still, pretty good job, man. Can't wait for Diana!
Swiggity swoogity, comin for dat booty.
hahhah I upvoted to 69 lololol #rekt #gg #ez 420 Blaze it lololoool illluminati confirmed #SMOKE WEED EVERYDAY

How you get the confidence to do this, I have no idea. I could never show anyone my art even if I thought it was slightly decent (which is never). But kudos to you, keep it up. You are superior to me at art in every regard, so I have no real critique to offer since I wouldn't even know where to start with these projects. Here, have a rare upvote from me.
I look forwards to seeing you portray the unbridled heroism and unflinching Justice that is {{champion:86}}.
Anyone else get this weird feeling like Aatrox reminds them of David Bowie somehow? Maybe it's the face or something.

That looks really good and who knows maybe riot will give you something when this is all said and done? Also I can't wait to see what your drawings of {{champion:107}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:6}}  look like! Keep up the great work!
You captured his no-nose, Voldemort-y face perfectly! XD

Dang, that looks great. Eagerly looking forward to see the rest! Also, saw the donation request on your DA, I do hope that works out. =s

Best of luck to you***!***
Dayum. Upvoted
really sick man

Aww my favorite champ is Zyra :c

And nice drawing btw.
you just won a new watcher on deviantart, keep it up! :D
And hey, you're a ~~brony~~ pegasis too? brohoof! :P
Lol this is good news for me! {{champion:143}}  is my favorite so your drawing skills should be stellar by then ;-) This is an awesome undertaking ,I wish you luck!!

WHEN YOU GET TO THE ADORABLE BALL OF JOY {{champion:150}} CONTACT ME WITH THE INFO PLEASE. 

Aside from me going off at the chance to see such beautiful artwork done on yordles, it looks extremely well drawn. Its pictures like these that make me practice drawing more.

That body looks really out of focus.  Need to touch that up.  I literally thought my vision was going.  Other than that, this is a kickass picture.  The scratches and chips on Aatrox's helmet... skull? are really nice touches, and it definitely fits the champion.  Touch this picture up a little, but don't stop working, I think you can do Ahri some really nice justice :3
Nice work :D keep going
Nice Peace Man

> [{quoted}](name=CPG Vanity,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=MQEeieh3,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-23T19:43:32.031+0000)
>
> So far I've only finished {{champion:266}}  but going in alphabetical order I'm planning on drawing out all the champions. {{champion:103}}  is up next.
> 
> What do you guys think so far?
> 
> Thanks for all the comments and suggestions. I know I messed up the sword - I realised that half way threw the drawing then said 'aw screw it'. As for the body detail yeah I'll make sure I get right on that, same with more background detail. :3

Reply off this quote when u Make Anivia, shes my main, and starts with A :D
You need to post them here each time you finish one; I'm gonna be stalking you for when you get to a few of my favorites :P
Draw Shen Please! ._.
dang, thats really good, it looks like he's getting back up from his ground pound

Gonna be a while until you get Maokai, Singed, and Quinn I see.

Have to say I agree with the others, a good start, but plenty of room to improve. The composition alone looks straight out of Riot's splash arts. Needs details though.

Keep up the good work :)
Could use some work on values/contrast but pretty nice overall

This is *a lot* of champions and I wish you all the luck in keeping that motivation!

This looks pretty good so far and if you complete all the champs (or even a fraction of them) you *will *improve. 

And if it's okay I'll give a little feedback: I feel Strawberrycocoa had a great point in that his body is murky, I'll also add that his face looks flat (overall this looks like a wip?). Increasing the darker values on his body and sharpening details will help with that murkiness, while adding a shadow from his head and headdress will add depth to his head area. 

Much love and good luck!

This looks amazing! I really liked how you captured Aatrox.

There is something that is off, and that is that Aatrox wields his sword in his left hand, not his right hand, but this piece of art is so good I don't think it matters too much.
That's spectacular!
I love aatrox so yeah GOOD JOB DUDE
Ya got my support!  Please go all the way!
i think it rocks. Keep us posted on your next works! :)
Im currently drawing Riven :D!
It looks great! Can't wait to see more!

Can't wait to see you draw the rest man, keep up the great work. :D

p.s You might get frustrated but take your time with these  ;)
Aatrox's hand looks like a bloody turd
Your drawing style has the perfect fit for aatrox, and while there are probably a few mistakes, the mood you set definitely outshines them. Good work!
